name: PKPass
desc: An object that represents a single pass.

items.name: init(data: Data)
items.desc: Creates a pass using the data you provide.

items.name: var secureElementPass: PKSecureElementPass?
items.desc: The pass that contains an accompanying credential that the device stores in the Secure Element.

items.name: var serialNumber: String
items.desc: A value that uniquely identifies the pass.

items.name: var deviceName: String
items.desc: The name of the device that hosts the pass.

items.name: var localizedName: String
items.desc: The localized name for the pass’s template.

items.name: var isRemotePass: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the pass is on a paired device, such as an Apple Watch.

items.name: var webServiceURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL for the web service.

items.name: var authenticationToken: String?
items.desc: The token for authenticating update requests.

items.name: func localizedValue(forFieldKey: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the localized value for a specified field of the pass.

items.name: var organizationName: String
items.desc: The name of the organization that creates the pass.

items.name: var relevantDate: Date?
items.desc: The date when the pass is most likely to be useful or necessary.

items.name: var passURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL that opens the pass in the Wallet app.
